synopsis.text:
Will power and determination fuel Akari Mamiya, a first-year student at Tokyo Butei High, as she dreams of becoming an elite Butei just like her idol, the S-ranked Aria Kanzaki. Despite her E-rank status and constant failures in rank exams, Akari's spirit remains unbroken. Defying her friends' skepticism, she seizes the opportunity to apply for the Amica program, hoping to become Aria's assistant. Much to everyone's surprise, Aria accepts Akari's request and puts her through a challenging test, which she miraculously passes.

Now, Akari must prove her worth to officially become Aria's Amica, facing the daunting task of meeting her idol's high standards. Juggling her high school life and intense training, Akari is not alone in her quest; her friends stand by her side, offering support and camaraderie. But danger lurks in the shadows, and Akari must unlock the power within herself to protect her friends and confront the truth of her past.

In this thrilling world where special students are authorized to carry weapons and solve crimes, can Akari rise from her E-rank beginnings and walk the same path as her revered idol, Aria Kanzaki? Only time will tell if she has what it takes to become a true Butei.
